topics.title: Option Pools Protocol Overview and DeFi Problems
topics.summary: Introduction to Option Pools as a pool-to-peer options trading AMM protocol for ErgoHack VIII. Explains current DeFi options problems including risk, liquidity, and performance issues that prevent significant market adoption compared to CeFi.

topics.title: Ergo Solution for On-Chain Options Pricing
topics.summary: Presents Ergo as the solution to DeFi options problems by enabling layer 1 options pricing using Black-Scholes model. Leverages UTXO model for security and Ergo's performance capabilities for on-chain computation.

topics.title: Option Pools UI Demo and Pool Setup
topics.summary: Live demonstration of the Option Pools user interface showing ERG-USD pool setup. Demonstrates adding liquidity with 10 ERG and explains pool ratio concepts including bearish/bullish positioning possibilities.

topics.title: Call Option Purchase and Black-Scholes Comparison
topics.summary: Demonstrates purchasing a call option with $1.24 strike price and compares pricing to theoretical Black-Scholes model. Shows on-chain options pricing working on Ergo layer 1 with volatility oracle and explains pricing discrepancies.

topics.title: Option Trading and Dynamic Pricing Demo
topics.summary: Shows selling the purchased call option and demonstrates dynamic pricing adjustments based on market demand. Also demonstrates put option pricing and explains dual-asset payment functionality that occurred accidentally but has potential use cases.

topics.title: ErgoScript Math Functions and Future Roadmap
topics.summary: Summarizes ErgoHack achievements including implementing mathematical functions in ErgoScript and creating a volatility oracle. Outlines future plans for Delta/Vega neutral pools and integration with DuckPools for improved liquidity.
